column1: comments
Good quality!

Very accomodating customer service, helped me to postpone delivery twice.

Delivery and assembly team was very efficient, in and out in 10 minutes.
Solidly built, eyeing this for 6 months and bought it only when price is reasonable during 3.3 sales. Collection is OK since only a stone throw from my house.
Highly recommended! Shipping was quick with regular updates from the seller, and item was received well packed. Will definitely purchase again next time!
rcvd in full n good condition
Great quality & sturdy. Nice furnishing. Hope it will last long!
Quite pricey but quality not bad. Easy to move around and not too heavy.
Item delivery took quite awhile, other than that the stand look sturdy but abit smaller than imagine.
Received the chair yesterday at this condition
Good quality. Took more than a month to arrive though which was different from the indicated date. Thankfully, seller was responsive enough.
Good product
Item arrived with an assembly kit and was delivered in good condition
Delivery take more than a week . Direct delivery by seller and service is good. Like the cabinet very much and it fit well in my living room.
Bed frame was delivered 9 days after placing order. It is sturdy and good. Satisfied with purchase.
Good deal. Delivery person was punctual
The nest of 3 little tables are very handsome and sturdy. You do have to pay for Scanteak but the brand is a promise of quality

Bought it during double 11 event. Beautiful piece of serving boards. Seller taken action promptly to my request about defect item and let me exchanged it at SINGPOST show room. Recommended for their great service

Received in good condition. 
Nice small wooden serving board. Thickness is only 0.8mm.
Item came in good condition! Thanks Seller!
Good solid item

The item was delivered on time as committed. 
No QC done on the furniture, the bookshelf was badly done that it went one sided which makes the shelf wobble (as seen in video).

The customer service (Sunny Chua) was good  managed the situation very well and replacement unit was in good shape.
Received in good condition
Repeat purchase and good price during promotion.
